data.why:
A module that presents an easy, OO way to produce multiple-leg trip
    maps, using maps.yahoo.com. E.g., a modularized version of the code
    at: http://perlmonks.org/index.pl?node_id=385544. See also my
    perlmonks history at http://perlmonks.org/index.pl?node_id=155512.

    Thanks!
